org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class Outbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.Outbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Outbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An outbox holds a collection of doSend buffers. Each doSend buffer holds one or more messages, all destined for the same targetReactor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_INITIAL_BUFFER_SIZE
      Default initial (per target Reactor) buffer.

      The facility of this outbox.

             Reactor _target)
        Buffers a message in the sending targetReactor for sending later.
